txt.en: The merrevail of Lumul-nar answer to Ergoth, a morroval-queen from Angmar.

Vile Wargs and fearsome merrevail darken Lumul-nar, the Hall of Mirrors. The light will not return here until the leaders of these evil creatures are dispatched.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed in the group version of the instance.</rgb>
Frost-tail is the chieftain of the Wargs who dwell in Lumul-nar.
